title: Intensive Short-Term Course on Core Concepts of Behavioral Science in Dentistry

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Dental Science Knowledge and Scientific Literacy at the Adult Learner Level
context.additional_context: Lecture-based content optimized for smart device-enabled microlearning environments, systematically delivering essential concepts in dental behavioral science to time-constrained working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five patient behavior types and corresponding response strategies with 80% accuracy
Learners can establish patient education plans for clinical scenarios by applying the pain perception model (Gate Control Theory)
Learners can design patient motivation strategies using the Stages of Change model

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
